KYLE.raw_line: No. Ohio.It's just my mother and me. She's back in Columbus. She couldn't come.Bus.Yeah.Hi.Yeah, you do. We just never met.OK.Yeah.OK. He fell asleep watching TV. So he lives there now?Are you a friend of his or something?What's that mean?That's cool.Yeah.Yeah. I told her I was coming home.No.Yeah. If I want to smoke should I go outside?I know. But if I do.OK. Good night, Jackie.OK. Bye Leo.No. I'm going home. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 32I won't.I have money.I have enough money. But thanks.Yeah. You too, Mike.I decided not to go home.You mind if I have a quick smoke?Not really.I can't live there anymore.No. She's not even there. She's in a clinic or hospital or whatever. I'm living with Craig.Her boyfriend, I guess, but he's an asshole.My mom? She doesn't care about me.She could've called, right?Can I go visit Leo?Yeah. Just down the street.OK.Now?Yeah, maybe.Hey Mike, you think I could practice with you guys tomorrow?You were right, they deserved it. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 43I don't have wrestling shoes.Yeah.Yeah.A couple years ago.Just felt like it.I'm pretty good.I have money.OK.Thanks. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 51Good.OK.One-nineteen.Is anyone there now?Don't you think we should wrestle off?Good match.Were you guys that bad?Hey, how do you think we'd do against Kyle? Now?You answered it?What'd she say?No. Can you not answer my phone anymore?I quit now that I'm wrestlingYeah. I went for a run.In season, yeah. I like to get my run in early and then drill some moves for an hour before school.Yeah...so I'm gonna do it. See you. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 58Yeah.Can you give me a slap?Give me a slap. Across the face. Like your waking me up.Can you do it harder?Yeah.Yeah, pretty good.Can I go with you?It's for Leo.He's doing OK. He can say some pretty funny things. Yesterday he told me I was fired.I don't know. He just fired me.Yeah. He's a pretty funny dude.A little but I already did it.Yeah but just to wrestle. My old coach thought I could get a scholarship.Yeah.It's kind of my own thing.Well, it's not a move or anything, I just tell myself that the guy on top is going to take my head and shove it under water and kill me. And if I don't want to die on the bottom, I just gotta do what ever the fuck it takes to get out.No.Yeah. But I never believe her anyway.But this place is pretty nice. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 66You want to take a walk outside, Leo?Your park, huh?Yeah. It's in my bag.Hey, Mike, can I ask you something?Leo told me that some Judge made him move into that place. Is that true or is he just making that up?Why? 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 67But he wants to live at home.No.You're not wrestling.You ever think about wrestling in a match? 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 69Thanks for letting me know.Yeah, I heard.He know's who I am now.Hi, can I watch TV in here? 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 71That's cool.Not really.What's it say?No I do not.Yeah. Me too. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 72Can I tell you something?I didn't quit my old team. I got thrown off.I stole a car.Yeah. That was part of the problem.A teacher's.It was really stupid.Yeah. Everything just got messed up after that.I guess.Mike?Stemler wants to wrestle today.Right.He could wrestle 119. I could bump up and get a pin at 125 and Jimmy goes 130. Then we're only giving up one weight class and we got a shot.You're just waiting for the green light, right?Hey, Stemler. Come here.If he's Darth Vader then you're the Secret Apprentice. You got this.Cool. It was good coaching with Stemler. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 80I don't know. I guess it just feels like I'm in control. Of everything. You know what I mean?It is.Hey, Leo. Guess who won the Districts?Me. And Mike said he got a call from a college scout about me.What are you doing here?So when wrestling's over I have to go?Where? 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 87I'll go see her at Leo's before practice. But I want to go alone.Don't worry, Mike. I'll go.Do you know she wants to take Leo back to Ohio?You're not gonna let her do that are you?What's complicated about it? She doesn't give a shit about Leo. They hate each other. You can't let her take him.Fine but I told her I'm staying with you guys until we leave.I'm sorry.I don't want to go with her. I don't.No. What do you want?Is that why you called me. Just to tell me that?Then leave him here. Where he is.What do you mean?What is it?This isn't real. The Judge told Leo he had to live there.Why?Why does he belong with us?Shut up! Shut up!Listen to me! I don't care about this. It's all bullshit. Leave Leo alone. He belongs here. Do you hear me? Do you?I brought him here.Yeah. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 107You don't have to worry about us.Making spaghetti.No.This is where he belongs.Yeah. We did! Listen to this.Mike Flaherty: Mr. Poplar wants to live at home. Judge Lee: You can do that Mike? Mike Flaherty: Yes, I can. Really.It's from the court.From my mother. It's true isn't, Mike?You're just like her.Leave me alone!Don't touch me!Explain what? How you lied to me? How you lied to Leo?Hello. Hello. Mom?No. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 112No. We got in a fight because he's an asshole.Yeah, really, Stem.The window.No. I'm leaving. I just came to get my shit.I know, Mike, you're sorry. Everyone's always sorry.It's too late. You'll lose. My mother's gonna take him. 5/15/10 - FULL SHOOTING SCRIPT - WIN WIN 115So what?! You want me to forgive you now? Is that it, Mike?!This is bullshit!I want to be alone.I JUST WANT TO BE DOWN HERE ALONE!OK.
